name: Money Heist (Murf-y)
description:
Money Heist

A simple stealth game for the 6wrniGameJam2.

Your mission is to break into the bank and steal the money will the electric current is down , but take care of guards they have flash lights and they can see you!

Controls:

WASD for the Movement.

E  for picking up money and putting them down!

Credits:

Music-Theme : Midnight creeping

Font : Lalezar

Made with ❤ 

Note:

Download the game it is a lot better then the WebGl version TRUST ME!
